lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : MiatriSs
[00:01.000] 作曲 : MiatriSs
[00:11.70]Let's hope this time we can this band together again
[00:14.78]You join the underground cabaret today
[00:17.08]Well hey there tell your name
[00:18.36]You try to run and tell the world but you stranded in a darkened cave
[00:21.10]Oh henry we hate you the same
[00:22.50]So listen up my friend
[00:23.38]There's more than meet the eye
[00:24.48]You power up the studio and bring it to life
[00:26.08]Now play the beat that trickles through the halls
[00:27.66]Or else your life is nevermore
[00:29.08]it's not the music that dies NOW LISTEN UP
[00:30.58]Our life support machine was brought to life by remarkable hands
[00:34.48]Forget about the hell we've seen the time has come to revive our band
[00:37.96]So bang the drums to a rhythm
[00:39.16]Captivating the beat
[00:39.86]And press the keys on the piano
[00:40.68]For the ritual please
[00:41.64]The song's alive with the night
[00:42.62]With your help we'll revive
[00:43.18]The devil's advocate
[00:44.24]Is staring right through your lies
[00:45.80]You're just returning our old strings tonight
[00:48.46]I hope you turn on the light now!
[00:49.88]Can i get an amen in here
[00:52.12]You see the magic of art
[00:53.82]It would tear you apart if you knew
[00:55.36]Can i get an amen in here?
[00:57.88]He had bigger plans for the band but demand we came back to his darkened cell 3x
[01:08.98]You're gonna break us out 5x this hell
[01:13.62]
[01:19.96]This hell
[01:20.74]
[01:26.80]You're gonna break us out of this hell
[01:28.88]He had bigger plans for the band but demand we came back to his darkened cell 2x
[01:40.40]He had bigger plans for the band but demand we came back to his darkened
[01:43.60]
[01:47.20]We've been stars since the rhythm days
[01:49.06]But our instruments have all grown tired
[01:51.00]And in the end our only dream was to dance hey took the dance away and we got retired
[01:54.50]But that was long ago we have a new change of face We turned it up a couple notches
[01:57.54]With a brand new pace
[01:58.70]You think they all just erased us Betrayed us, enslaved us But the deed is done and we want to get out! Now listen up
[02:02.90]Ain't it nice to be underground with a good ol' friend like me (a friend like me yeah)
[02:06.52]So you notice that sign we ain't lying but sit down and take a seat (take a seat)
[02:09.90]There's an exit for sure but that's'for shmucks
[02:12.20]But little bit of lnk and a couple of bucks
[02:14.12]We can reopen the curtain and show off the strut but for goodness sake you gotta just believe
[02:18.06]You're just returning our old strings tonight I hope you turn on the light now!
[02:21.52]Can i get an amen in here you see the magic of art
[02:26.20]It would tear you apart if you knew
[02:27.84]Can i get an amen in here
[02:29.56]He had bigger plans for the band but demand we came back to his darkened cell 3x
[02:41.10]You're gonna break us out 2x
[02:42.84]Welcome to the Gospel of Dismay
[02:45.64](instrumental)
[02:56.38]Welcome to the gospel of 2x
[02:58.90]GOSPEL OF DISMAAYYYYY!!
[03:02.10]We came x2 this hell you're gonna break we came to his darkened cell this hell you're gonna break us out we came 3x this hell
[03:12.26]WELCOME TO THE GOSPEL OF DISMAAAAAYYYYYY!!! 2x/3x
[03:19.54]Welcome to the Gospel of
[03:21.48]Welcome to the GOSPEL OF DISMAAAYYYYY!!!
[03:27.14]Welcome to the gospel of 2x
[03:30.36]DISMAAAYYYYY!!!!! He had bigger plans for the band but demand we came back to his darkened cell 3x
[03:43.10]Welcome to the Gospel of 2x
[03:45.50]Welcome to the Gospel of Dismaaayyyyy!!!!
[03:48.70]Gospel of Dismaayyyyyy!!!!
[03:51.50]
[03:53.50]Dismaayyyyy!!!!
[03:55.50]
tlyric:
[by:watersimilar]
[00:11.70]让我们祈祷这次我们能再聚首
[00:14.78]今天你来到了地下不夜城
[00:17.08]来吧告诉我你的名字
[00:18.36]你想逃跑说出真相可惜你脚下正是无底深渊
[00:21.10]哦亨利我们也一样讨厌你
[00:22.50]所以我的朋友你听好
[00:23.38]这不只有你眼前的这些
[00:24.48]来给我们的演播室供上电让它焕发光彩
[00:26.08]现在点燃响彻大厅的节奏
[00:27.66]否则你的生命就到此
[00:29.08]消失的可不是音乐哦   现在听好了
[00:30.58]支撑我们活下去的机器被了不起的双手赋予生命
[00:34.48]忘记我们在地狱见过的那些光景 现在正是我们乐队的复兴时刻
[00:37.96]打起节奏鼓点
[00:39.16]使你的心跳着迷
[00:39.86]弹起黑白琴键
[00:40.68]为了这仪式的欢乐
[00:41.64]歌声伴着夜晚苏醒
[00:42.62]有了你的帮助我们方可复活
[00:43.18]恶魔的拥护者
[00:44.24]会看穿你的谎言
[00:45.80]你只需拿回我们的旧琴弦
[00:48.46]开灯吧现在
[00:49.88]来点赞成的掌声
[00:52.12]你见证这艺术的魔力
[00:53.82]它会将你震碎
[00:55.36]来点掌声吧
[00:57.88]他对乐队有个大计划 但是要我们回到他黑暗的牢房
[01:08.98]你会帮我们越狱的
[01:19.96]逃离这个地狱
[01:26.80]你会帮我们离开这个鬼地方
[01:28.88]他对乐队有个大计划 但是要我们回到他黑暗的牢房
[01:40.40]他对乐队有个大计划 但是要我们回到他黑暗的牢房
[01:47.20]在节奏响彻的日子里我们是闪耀的巨星
[01:49.06]可惜乐器们都精疲力尽
[01:51.00]最后我们唯一的愿望就是跳舞 却也被他夺走 我们只好歇业
[01:54.50]但是那是很久以前的事了 我们现在改头换面 我们可不像原来那么天真
[01:57.54]以我们全新的速度
[01:58.70]你觉得他们全都只想抹去我们背叛我们，奴役我们      但是契约已经完成我们想要被解放    再给我听好
[02:02.90]在地下有我这么个好朋友难道不好吗
[02:06.52]你看我们没有说谎  坐吧坐吧
[02:09.90]这是有个出口但那是给笨蛋们走的
[02:12.20]只要一点墨水和几块钱
[02:14.12]我们可使帷幕重开尽情炫耀 看在老天爷的份上你可要相信
[02:18.06]今晚你只需拿回我们的旧琴弦  我希望你现在把灯光打开
[02:21.52]来点掌声在这你看到艺术的魔力
[02:26.20]它会将你震碎
[02:27.84]来点掌声吧
[02:29.56]他对乐队有个大计划 但是要我们回到他黑暗的牢房
[02:41.10]你会帮我们越狱的
[02:42.84]欢迎收听悲惨福音
[02:45.64]
